ExploreHosting_HIWItems.Title: Have a car? Start sharing
ExploreHosting_HIWItems.Description: Become a Host and list your car on Getaround. You'll help your neighbors travel easier while making extra money each month.

HearCommunity_HIW.title: Hear from the community
HearCommunity_HIW.content: Stories from Getaround community members, in their own words.

Proprietary_HIW.title: Explore the power of Getaround Connect®
Proprietary_HIW.description: Getaround vehicles are powered by our proprietary Connect® technology. To make sharing a car as easy as owning one, we built the only hardware designed specifically for contactless, peer-to-peer car sharing.
Proprietary_HIW.description2: allows you to find, book, and unlock cars directly from your phone, and avoid meeting up with anyone  throughout the process to exchange keys.

SlideLeftRight_HIW.label: Trip insurance
contents: Getaround trips include insurance for the length of your reservation. You shouldn't have to stress if something doesn't go according to plan.

SlideLeftRight_HIW.label: Customer support
contents: We're here to solve problems at any point of your trip, from the wee hours of the morning to late at night.

SlideLeftRight_HIW.label: Wiggle room for changes
contents: Plans changed? Cancel within 1 hour of booking or more than 24 hours before the start of your trip, and you won't be charged any fees.

Slide_HIW.title: Chúng tôi kết nối những chiếc xe an toàn, tiện lợi với mọi người
Slide_HIW.content1: Người chia sẻ xe hưởng lợi bằng việc tiếp cận linh hoạt đến một phương tiện xe hơi.
Slide_HIW.content2: Chủ xe hơi kiếm tiền từ những khoảng thời gian họ không lái xe dù sao.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.title: Get the Getaround app
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.subTitle: Download and join for free. You'll never pay a membership fee.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.title: Find the perfect vehicle
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.subTitle: Explore cars, trucks, vans, and more. Book instantly from the app—hourly rates mean you only pay for the time you reserve.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.title: Hit the road
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_1.subTitle: Unlock your car directly through the Getaround app. No meetups or key exchanges.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.title: Sign up and name your car.
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.subTitle: On the sign-up form, you'll tell us about you and your car. Give your car a name, and continue to the next step.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.title: Create a profile and upload photos.
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.subTitle: If you have multiple vehicles, use the car manager to create a profile for each one. Listing each car costs $100 for initial setup and $20 per month—but you wont be charged until your car is ready for bookings.

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.title: Install Getaround Connect®
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.subTitle: We'll reach out to have our proprietary hardware, Getaround Connect®, installed in your car. Connect® lets guests unlock the car with their phone, and gives you insights about the car, trips, and vehicle security. Once Connect® is installed, you're ready for bookings!

CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.title: Start earning!
CustomeSteps_HowItWork_2.subTitle: As soon as you enable bookings, guests can start taking trips in your car—and you can start earning money.
